backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining user sessions, messages, and game metadata with CRUD operations for chat sessions, artworks, music, and games; includes blob storage mixin for media handling.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting three high-confidence features: standalone HTML generation, proper HTML5 structure, and interactive demo page showcasing Neroxa AI's core capabilities.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of frontend files including components, hooks, and configuration for the Neroxa AI application with responsive design, chat sessions, media generation, translation, music, art, code, and games features.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system defining light and dark theme variables for backgrounds, foregrounds, borders, and component colors with deep blacks and vibrant accents.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry point with comprehensive SEO meta tags, Open Graph tags, Twitter Card tags, canonical URL, JSON-LD structured data, PWA manifest link, and theme color for optimal indexing and social sharing.
frontend/public/demo.html: Standalone interactive demo page with inline CSS and JavaScript showcasing Neroxa AI features (chat, math, media, translation, music, art, code, games) using dark OKLCH theme and responsive tab navigation.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining Neroxa AI app metadata, icons, display mode, theme colors, and orientation for installable web application experience.
frontend/public/robots.txt: Robots.txt file allowing all user agents to crawl all paths on the site.
frontend/public/sitemap.xml: XML sitemap listing all main application routes (home, chat, math, media, translation, music, art, code, games) with priorities and update frequencies for search engine crawling.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application component that handles routing, authentication via Internet Identity, and renders different feature tabs (chat, math solver, media, translator, music, art, scripter, games) with a sidebar and header. Shows a login screen for unauthenticated users.
frontend/src/components/ArtCanvas.tsx: Interactive drawing canvas component with color palette, brush size controls, eraser tool, AI art idea generator chat, and artwork sharing/download functionality. Uses custom hooks for canvas drawing, AI suggestions, and artwork sharing.
frontend/src/components/ChatSidebar.tsx: Collapsible sidebar that displays chat session history with timestamps, allows creating new chat sessions, and handles session selection. Shows loading states and empty states when no sessions exist.
frontend/src/components/ChatView.tsx: Chat interface component that displays messages for a specific session with user/assistant avatars, handles message input with keyboard shortcuts, and simulates AI responses with typing indicators.
frontend/src/components/GameCard.tsx: Card component displaying game metadata (title, description, category, thumbnail) with hover effects and a play button that triggers game launch. Shows 'Coming Soon' for non-playable games.
frontend/src/components/GamePlayer.tsx: Modal dialog component for playing games with fullscreen toggle, loading/error states, and displays game metadata. Currently shows a placeholder interface where the actual game player would be rendered.
frontend/src/components/GamesView.tsx: Displays a paginated, filterable catalogue of games with search and category filters. Includes a GamePlayer component for playing selected games.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Application header with branding, theme toggle (light/dark), and sign-out button for authenticated users. Uses Internet Identity for authentication.
frontend/src/components/MathProblemSolve: Math problem solver with difficulty levels, teacher mode, and homework helper mode. Evaluates expressions client-side and generates step-by-step solutions with concept explanations.
frontend/src/components/MediaDisplay.tsx: AI media generator interface with tabs for images and videos. Allows users to generate media from text prompts and displays generated content in a grid.
frontend/src/components/MusicGenerator.t: Music generation tool with AI-based audio generation from prompts and a beat pattern sequencer. Includes playback controls, tempo adjustment, and music sharing functionality.
frontend/src/components/Scripter.tsx: Code generation chat interface where users describe coding tasks and receive generated code snippets. Includes copy-to-clipboard functionality for generated code.
frontend/src/components/SharedContentVie: React component that displays shared artwork or music content by ID, fetching from backend hooks and showing loading/error states with navigation back to home.
frontend/src/components/TranslatorChat.t: Translation chat interface component with language selection dropdowns, message history display, and input area for translating text between 10 supported languages.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor based on Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useArtIdeaGenerator.t: Hook that generates art prompt suggestions based on user input keywords (animals, landscapes, abstract, portraits, fantasy, space, flowers, food) with randomized creative ideas.
frontend/src/hooks/useArtworkShare.ts: Hook that converts canvas to PNG blob, uploads to backend via actor, generates shareable artwork URLs, and provides clipboard copy functionality.
frontend/src/hooks/useAudioGeneration.ts: Hook that generates synthetic audio using Web Audio API based on text prompts, creating simple melodies and converting AudioBuffer to WAV blobs for playback.
frontend/src/hooks/useCanvasDrawing.ts: Hook managing canvas drawing state and operations including mouse/touch drawing, color/brush size control, eraser mode, and canvas clearing with coordinate scaling.
frontend/src/hooks/useChatSessions.ts: Provides React hooks for managing chat sessions including fetching user sessions, adding messages, and creating new sessions with automatic user registration. Uses React Query for state management and caching.
frontend/src/hooks/useGameCatalogue.ts: Exports hooks for fetching game catalogue data and individual game metadata from the backend actor using React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication for ICP, providing a React context and hook for login/logout functionality with identity persistence and delegation management.
frontend/src/hooks/useMediaGeneration.ts: Provides mock AI image and video generation functionality using canvas to create placeholder media with gradient backgrounds and text overlays.
frontend/src/hooks/useMusicShare.ts: Handles music sharing by converting audio blobs to ExternalBlob format, uploading to the backend actor, and providing URL copying functionality.
frontend/src/hooks/useScriptGeneration.t: Provides mock AI script generation for various programming languages (React, Python, JavaScript) based on user prompts with conversation history management.
frontend/src/hooks/useSharedContent.ts: Fetches shared artwork and music content by ID from the backend actor, converting ExternalBlob data to accessible URLs.
frontend/src/hooks/useTranslation.ts: Implements mock translation functionality with support for multiple languages, maintaining translation history and simulating API delays.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration file defining a dark-themed design system with custom CSS variables for colors (teal primary, coral accent), typography using Inter and Poppins fonts, and sidebar styling.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility module exporting a `cn` function that combines clsx and tailwind-merge for conditional Tailwind CSS class name merging.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React application entry point that sets up QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, and renders the root App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending the default theme with custom colors using OKLCH color space, border radius variables, custom shadows, and keyframe animations for accordions, slides, and fades.
project_state.json: Project state tracking file for Neroxa AI application documenting existing features (standalone HTML generation, HTML5 structure, interactive demo page) and a pending feature request to create a real HTML page.
